description: I am down to earth and get along with most people. I love helping others and being able to pay back the support given to me in my time of need. I’ve had my share of issues with relationships but really do want to settle down and grow old with someone who can tolerate me faults and all. Spending quality time is important to me as I’ve had my share of health issues also. Material things are not as important as memories! So meeting in person is a must to see how we get along to create memories
